scripts.build: next build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const src=path.join(__dirname,'out'); const dest=path.join(__dirname,'..','public','next-export'); fs.rmSync(dest,{recursive:true, force:true}); fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true}); fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});"
